description.value:
Provides +10 to Survival Tests. Includes: 2 Razor Blades, Igniter, flexible Wire Saw, 14 Fishing Hooks, 5 Fishing Lures, 25m of Fishing Line, 1 Large Hook, 10m of brass-wire snare, 1 Torch, one Calibrated Compass with a world-specific guide page, 4 Stimm doses, 6 Antibiotic tablets, 20 water purifying tablets, 2 flexi bags, 1m of adhesive tape, 3m of Spinlin Cord, 1/2m of stronger tape...

Requirements

...3m of sewing thread, 3 sewing needles, 1 surgical needle, 8 safety fasteners, 1m^2 of foil, 1 Quill, ink, 2 sheets of tough paper, and a mirror finished case to hold it all and act as a signal.

Effect: Average

Notes: 120 T
